recipes.title: Masala Dosa
prerequisites: Potato boiled and mashed from previous day
recipes.description: Crispy South Indian crepe filled with spiced potato masala, served with coconut chutney and sambar.

steps.title: Prepare potato masala
steps.text: Heat oil in pan, add mustard seeds and curry leaves. When they splutter, add chopped onions, green chilies and ginger. Saut√© until onions turn golden. Add turmeric, mashed potatoes and salt. Mix well and cook for 6 minutes.

steps.title: Make the dosa
steps.text: Heat griddle, pour a ladle of batter in center and spread it thin in circular motion. Drizzle oil around edges and cook until golden brown, approximately 3 minutes.

steps.title: Fill and fold
steps.text: Place potato masala on one half of the dosa, fold over and serve hot with coconut chutney and sambar.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
prerequisites: Large pot of salted water boiling
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta with garlic, olive oil, and red pepper flakes - simple yet incredibly flavorful.

steps.title: Cook the pasta
steps.text: Add spaghetti to boiling salted water and cook according to package directions, usually 8-10 minutes until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining.

steps.title: Prepare aglio e olio
steps.text: In large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add sliced garlic and red pepper flakes. Cook until garlic is golden and fragrant, about 2-3 minutes. Don't let it burn!

steps.title: Combine and serve
steps.text: Add drained pasta to the skillet with garlic oil. Toss with pasta water if needed. Add parsley, season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately with parmesan if desired.

recipes.title: Butter Chicken
recipes.description: Rich and creamy North Indian curry with tender chicken in a tomato-butter sauce.

steps.title: Cook marinated chicken
steps.text: Heat oil in heavy-bottomed pan. Add marinated chicken pieces and cook until golden brown on all sides, about 8-10 minutes. Remove and set aside.

steps.title: Make base gravy
steps.text: In same pan, add butter, onions, ginger-garlic paste. Cook until onions are golden. Add tomato puree, cook for 15 minutes until oil separates.

steps.title: Finish with cream
steps.text: Add chicken back to pan, pour in cream, add garam masala and salt. Simmer for 10 minutes until chicken is cooked through and sauce is creamy.
